pageProduct.name: Pain Away Pro Salt X 600g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Soaking in Pain Away Pro-Salt X bath salts is the perfect way for your body to unwind and is one of the most effective recovery remedies for soothing overworked, tired, tense and aching muscles.

Warnings

For external use only. If you have a history of high blood pressure, or are pregnant, please consult your healthcare professional before using Pain Away Pro-Salt X. If Skin irritation occurs discontinue use. If product gets into your eyes rinse thoroughly with clean lukewarm water. Please drink plenty of fluids during bath duration to ensure hydration levels.

Ingredients

Magnesium Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Carbonate, Potassium Phosphate, Silica, Lemon Oil, Eucalyptus Oil, CI 15985.

Directions

For relaxation - Take 1-2 caps full of Pain Away Pro-Salt X and blend into a warm to hot bath. Soak in bath for at least 15-20 minutes to obtain optimal relaxation benefits. For Sports recovery - Take 2-4 caps full of Pain Away Pro-Salt X and blend into a warm to hot bath. Soak in bath for at least 20-30 minutes to obtain optimal recovery benefits.
